action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Iwamoto, Morikawa, Poepoe, Woodson, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Hashem, Ichiyama, Lamosao, Souza.
